name: electrum-require-components
description: This Electrum build tool generates a source file with a list of requires.

scripts.babel: babel --quiet --out-dir lib src && babel --quiet --out-dir lib.test src.test
scripts.compile: npm run clean && require-self && npm run babel
scripts.test: npm run compile && npm run mocha
scripts.livetest: npm run compile && node lib/index.js --wrap ./src sample .foo.js foo.js
